item.title: Custom Canva Templates for Fashion Products on Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled graphic designer to craft custom Canva templates with image and text placeholders for showcasing our fashion products on Instagram. The templates will be designed for posts, reels, and stories, featuring a sleek black & white aesthetic. Each template should allocate 70-80% of the space for product images, with placeholders for the product code, name, and price. Additionally, we need short video templates created from product images, accompanied by royalty-free jazz background music.

As the designer, you'll be responsible for creating visually striking templates that reflect our brand's style. Both the static and video templates should be fully editable and user-friendly, allowing us to easily swap out images and text.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in Canva
- Strong graphic design skills
- Attention to detail
- Knowledge of Instagram's post, reel, and story formats
- Experience with video creation and editing
- Ability to source and integrate royalty-free music

This is a small project expected to be completed within 1 to 2 weeks. We are looking for an intermediate-level designer with experience in creating social media templates for fashion brands. If you have a portfolio that showcases similar work, please include it in your proposal.

We are eager to work with a creative designer who can elevate our Instagram presence and help us present our fashion products in a compelling and professional manner.

Budget: $100

item.title: Creative Video Editor and Content Coordinator for Social Media (Spanish and Italian) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and innovative video editor and content coordinator to join our team. The primary focus of this role is to conceptualize, coordinate, and edit engaging and high-quality user-generated content (UGC) videos for our social media accounts and ad campaigns. The videos will primarily be about our natural supplements and occasionally include simple suggestions about a healthy lifestyle.

Responsibilities:

Conceptualize and generate creative ideas for 30-second videos that communicate our message through text (no spoken content).
Provide direction and guidelines for producing necessary footage to our Collaboration team, who will communicate directly with the creators.
Edit and finalize videos using existing footage provided by creators, ensuring they are engaging and ready for publication.
Stay updated with social media trends and incorporate them into video concepts to maximize engagement and reach on platforms like Instagram and TikTok.
Ensure all content is delivered in both Italian and Spanish versions. Note: Knowledge of these languages is not required; we will use translators for this purpose.
Produce at least one video per week (two versions: Italian and Spanish).
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating engaging video content, preferably for social media.
Strong creative skills with a focus on idea generation and the ability to direct creators to produce footage.
Ability to stay on top of social media trends and incorporate them into your work.
Proficiency in video editing software (your choice).
Ability to deliver high-quality work consistently and meet deadlines.
Portfolio showcasing your previous video content work.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00

Category: Video Production
